### Row 1.1
```{r}
knitr::kable(iris)
```

Column
----------------------------------
### Boxplot de Iris
```{r}
iris %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Species, y=Sepal.Width, color=Species))+
  geom_boxplot()
```



### Row 2.2
```{r}
iris %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Sepal.Width, y= ..density.., color=Species))+
  geom_histogram()+
  geom_density()+
  facet_wrap(.~Species)
```
